BOOT.REGISTERING_ON_SERVER: Registering this device on the server

SETUP.TITLE: Setup
SETUP.AUTHENTICATION_FAILED_DESC: Make sure your email and password are correct.
SETUP.LOGIN_ERROR_DESC: You might not have an internet connection please enable it and then login again. If this fails as well then please quit the application, start it again and try to login once more.
SETUP.SETUP_ERROR_DESC: We are sorry but the setup did not succeed. Please close the application entirely and start the application again. Thanks.
